data.oai_dc:dc: Landmark dataset (in .tps format), phylogenetic trees (in .tre format), MrBayes command for FBD tip-dating (in .nex format), and R script with geometric morphometric, disparity, SURFACE and bayou analyses.
Geometric morphometrics|Ecology|Body size|Cranial shape|Phylogenetic comparative methods|Adaptive landscape|Macroevolutionary patters
